scripts.init: mkdir cmake-build && cd cmake-build && cmake -DCMAKE_SH="CMAKE_SH-NOTFOUND" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -G "CodeBlocks - MinGW Makefiles" ..
scripts.init:test: mkdir cmake-build && cd cmake-build && cross-env CI=true cmake -DCMAKE_SH="CMAKE_SH-NOTFOUND" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -G "CodeBlocks - MinGW Makefiles" ..
scripts.test: npm run build:test && cd bin && table-converter_test && calculator_test

hooks.pre-push: npm run clean && npm run init:test && npm test
